content:
TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Plugins and Options DESCRIPTION: This JavaScript code demonstrates how to import FullCalendar components, instantiate a new Calendar object with plugins, and configure it with options. It sets up a calendar with interaction and day grid plugins, initializes it in week view mode, enables event editing, and adds a sample event. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import interactionPlugin from '@fullcalendar/interaction' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ interactionPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'timeGridWeek', editable: true, events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with JavaScript DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code for instantiating and rendering a FullCalendar instance. It imports the required modules, selects the container element, creates a Calendar object with configuration options like plugins, view type, and events, then renders the calendar. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/core/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ dayGridPlugin // any other plugins ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', weekends: false, events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Google Calendar Integration DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code for setting up a FullCalendar instance with Google Calendar integration. This example imports the necessary modules, creates a calendar with the Google Calendar plugin, configures it to display events from a specific Google Calendar ID, and renders it on the page. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/google-calendar/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import googleCalendarPlugin from '@fullcalendar/google-calendar' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ googleCalendarPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', events: { googleCalendarId: 'abcd1234@group.calendar.google.com' } }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with CDN in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to set up a basic FullCalendar instance using the CDN-hosted script. It includes the necessary HTML structure and JavaScript code to create and render a calendar with the default 'dayGridMonth' view. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/bundle/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Instantiating a FullCalendar with Interaction Plugin DESCRIPTION: This JavaScript code demonstrates how to create a FullCalendar instance with the interaction and daygrid plugins. It shows the necessary imports, configuration options, and how to render the calendar. The calendar is set up with month view, event editing, date selection, and a sample event. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/interaction/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import interactionPlugin from '@fullcalendar/interaction' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ interactionPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', editable: true, // important for activating event interactions! selectable: true, // important for activating date selectability! events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Bootstrap 5 Theme DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to set up a FullCalendar instance using the Bootstrap 5 theme. It imports necessary modules, stylesheets, and configures the calendar with plugins and theme settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/bootstrap5/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import bootstrap5Plugin from '@fullcalendar/bootstrap5' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' // import bootstrap stylesheets directly from your JS import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import 'bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css' // needs additional webpack config! const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ bootstrap5Plugin, dayGridPlugin ], themeSystem: 'bootstrap5', // important! initialView: 'dayGridMonth' }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Time Grid Plugin DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to create a calendar instance with the time grid plugin. Shows how to import dependencies, configure the calendar with plugins, set initial view, and add events. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/timegrid/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import timeGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/timegrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [timeGridPlugin], initialView: 'timeGridWeek', events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Day Grid Plugin in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to create a FullCalendar instance with the Day Grid Plugin. It imports necessary modules, sets up the calendar with the plugin, configures the initial view, adds an event, and renders the calendar. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/daygrid/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [dayGridPlugin], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing FullCalendar with List View in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example of how to instantiate a FullCalendar with the list view plugin. This code imports the necessary modules, creates a calendar instance with the list plugin, configures it to use the list view by default, and adds a sample event. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/list/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import listPlugin from '@fullcalendar/list' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [listPlugin], initialView: 'listWeek', events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing FullCalendar with iCalendar Feed DESCRIPTION: Example JavaScript code that demonstrates how to instantiate a Calendar with the iCalendar plugin. The code imports required modules, creates a calendar instance with the appropriate plugins, configures it to fetch events from an iCalendar feed, and renders it on the page. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/icalendar/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import iCalendarPlugin from '@fullcalendar/icalendar' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ iCalendarPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', events: { url: 'https://mywebsite.com/icalendar-feed.ics', format: 'ics' // important! } }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Moment Plugin DESCRIPTION: This JavaScript example demonstrates how to instantiate a FullCalendar instance with the Moment plugin. It shows importing necessary dependencies, setting up the calendar with plugins, and configuring a date format using Moment's formatting syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/moment/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import momentPlugin from '@fullcalendar/moment' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ momentPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', titleFormat: 'MMMM D, YYYY' // use Moment format strings }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing FullCalendar with Multi-Month View in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example code demonstrating how to import and initialize a FullCalendar instance with the multi-month plugin. It creates a calendar with a multi-month year view and a sample event. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/multimonth/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import multiMonthPlugin from '@fullcalendar/multimonth' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [multiMonthPlugin], initialView: 'multiMonthYear', events: [ { title: 'Meeting', start: new Date() } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Instantiating FullCalendar with Luxon Plugin DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code demonstrating how to import and initialize a FullCalendar instance with the Luxon plugin. Shows configuration of Luxon-specific features like format strings and named time zones. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon1/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import luxonPlugin from '@fullcalendar/luxon' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ luxonPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', titleFormat: 'LLLL d, yyyy', // use Luxon format strings timeZone: 'America/New_York' // enhance named time zones }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing FullCalendar with RRule recurring events DESCRIPTION: Example code showing how to initialize a FullCalendar instance with the RRule plugin to create recurring events. This snippet demonstrates a weekly recurring meeting on Mondays and Fridays. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/rrule/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import rrulePlugin from '@fullcalendar/rrule' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ rrulePlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', events: [ { title: 'Meeting', rrule: { freq: 'weekly', byweekday: ['mo', 'fr'] } } ] }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with ES modules in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to import and use FullCalendar with ES modules. It shows the JavaScript code to create and render a calendar with the default 'dayGridMonth' view after the DOM has loaded. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/bundle/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from 'fullcalendar' document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { initialView: 'dayGridMonth' }) calendar.render() }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Bootstrap 4 Theme DESCRIPTION: This JavaScript code demonstrates how to instantiate a FullCalendar instance with the Bootstrap 4 theme. It imports necessary modules, stylesheets, and configures the calendar with plugins and theme system. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/bootstrap4/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import bootstrapPlugin from '@fullcalendar/bootstrap' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' // import third-party stylesheets directly from your JS import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css' import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.css' // needs additional webpack config! const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ bootstrapPlugin, dayGridPlugin ], themeSystem: 'bootstrap', // important! initialView: 'dayGridMonth' }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar with npm DESCRIPTION: Installation command for FullCalendar core package along with the daygrid plugin using npm. The core package must be used with at least one plugin to function properly. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/core/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing FullCalendar with Moment Timezone Plugin DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example showing how to instantiate a Calendar with the Moment Timezone plugin. The example demonstrates importing required modules, initializing the calendar with plugins, and setting a named time zone. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/moment-timezone/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import momentTimezonePlugin from '@fullcalendar/moment-timezone' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ momentTimezonePlugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', timeZone: 'America/New_York' // enhance named time zones }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins with npm DESCRIPTION: This command installs the FullCalendar core package along with the interaction and daygrid plugins using npm. These are the basic packages needed to get started with FullCalendar. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/interaction @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Luxon Plugin DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code demonstrating how to import and initialize a FullCalendar instance with Luxon plugin integration. Shows configuration for custom date formatting and time zone handling. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon3/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import luxon3Plugin from '@fullcalendar/luxon3' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ luxon3Plugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', titleFormat: 'LLLL d, yyyy', // use Luxon format strings timeZone: 'America/New_York' // enhance named time zones }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar with Google Calendar Plugin DESCRIPTION: Command for installing the required npm packages for using FullCalendar with Google Calendar integration. This includes the core FullCalendar package, the Google Calendar plugin, and the daygrid plugin for month view display. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/google-calendar/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/google-calendar @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Initializing FullCalendar with Luxon 2 Plugin in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to create a FullCalendar instance with Luxon 2 plugin integration. It demonstrates importing necessary modules, configuring plugins, and setting up calendar options including Luxon-specific formatting and time zone handling. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon2/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { Calendar } from '@fullcalendar/core' import luxon2Plugin from '@fullcalendar/luxon2' import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid' const calendarEl = document.getElementById('calendar') const calendar = new Calendar(calendarEl, { plugins: [ luxon2Plugin, dayGridPlugin ], initialView: 'dayGridMonth', titleFormat: 'LLLL d, yyyy', // use Luxon format strings timeZone: 'America/New_York' // enhance named time zones }) calendar.render() ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Bootstrap and FullCalendar Packages DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing Bootstrap 5, Bootstrap Icons, FullCalendar core, Bootstrap plugin, and DayGrid plugin using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/bootstrap5/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install bootstrap@5 bootstrap-icons ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/bootstrap5 @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Day Grid Plugin with npm DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the necessary packages for using the FullCalendar Day Grid Plugin. It requires both the core package and the day grid plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/daygrid/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and List View Packages with npm DESCRIPTION: Command to install the necessary npm packages for using FullCalendar with the List View plugin. This installs both the core FullCalendar package and the list view extension. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/list/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/list ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calendar Event Data Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: JSON array containing calendar event objects with properties for ID, start time, end time, title, body content, and display settings. Each event includes timestamps in milliseconds, boolean flags for all-day events, and extension IDs. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [{"id":830,"start":1262279460000,"end":1262281260000,"title":"this is a long event isnt that right?","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2},{"id":831,"start":1262282052000,"end":1262283852000,"title":"830","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2}] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Time Grid Dependencies DESCRIPTION: NPM command to install the required FullCalendar core and timegrid plugin packages. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/timegrid/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/timegrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calendar Event JSON Structure for FullCalendar DESCRIPTION: This JSON represents calendar events with timestamps, titles, and configuration properties. Each event has an id, start/end times in milliseconds (Unix timestamp format), title, body content field, multi flag, allDay status, and an extension_id property. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` {"id":252,"start":1265076252000,"end":1265078052000,"title":"251","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Multi-Month Plugin Dependencies DESCRIPTION: Installs the core FullCalendar package and the multi-month plugin using npm. These packages are required to implement the multi-month calendar view functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/multimonth/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/multimonth ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calendar Event Data Structure in JSON DESCRIPTION: A JSON array of calendar event objects used by FullCalendar. Each event contains an ID, start and end timestamps (in milliseconds since epoch), title, empty body, multi-day flag, all-day flag, and an extension ID property. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` {"id":998,"start":1262714916000,"end":1262716716000,"title":"997","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: FullCalendar Event Objects JSON Format DESCRIPTION: A collection of calendar event objects in JSON format for the FullCalendar library. Each event includes a unique ID, start and end timestamps in milliseconds since epoch, title, body content, multi and allDay flags, and an extension ID. The timestamps appear to be sequential with regular intervals between events. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` { "id": 914, "start": 1262497188000, "end": 1262498988000, "title": "913", "body": "", "multi": 0, "allDay": false, "extension_id": 2 } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install the FullCalendar core package, the interaction plugin, and the daygrid plugin using npm. These are the necessary dependencies for creating an interactive calendar. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/interaction/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/interaction @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Structured JSON Event Data for FullCalendar DESCRIPTION: JSON formatted calendar event data for the FullCalendar library. Each event includes properties such as id, start and end timestamps (in milliseconds since epoch), title, body content, multi-day flag, allDay flag, and extension_id. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` {"id":84,"start":1264640796000,"end":1264642596000,"title":"83","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2},... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins DESCRIPTION: This command installs the FullCalendar core package, the Bootstrap plugin, and the daygrid plugin using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/bootstrap4/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/bootstrap @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Event Object Array Structure for FullCalendar in JSON DESCRIPTION: This code represents a JSON array of event objects for the FullCalendar library. Each event contains properties including unique id, start/end timestamps (in milliseconds since epoch), title, body, multi flag (boolean indicator), allDay flag (false in all cases), and extension_id (consistently set to 2). SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` {"id":336,"start":1265293980000,"end":1265295780000,"title":"335","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2},{"id":337,"start":1265296572000,"end":1265298372000,"title":"336","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2},{"id":338,"start":1265299164000,"end":1265300964000,"title":"337","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Calendar Events JSON Structure DESCRIPTION: JSON data representing calendar events with timestamps, titles, and metadata. Each event has an ID, start/end times in Unix timestamp format, title, body content, and flags for multi-day and all-day events. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [{"id":168,"start":1264858524000,"end":1264860324000,"title":"167","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2},{"id":169,"start":1264861116000,"end":1264862916000,"title":"168","body":"","multi":0,"allDay":false,"extension_id":2}] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating DOM Element for FullCalendar DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for creating a container element that will hold the calendar. The div with ID 'calendar' is the target element where the calendar will be rendered. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/core/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Event Objects for FullCalendar in JSON DESCRIPTION: A JSON array containing event objects for FullCalendar initialization. Each object includes a title field and start datetime, with optional allDay property to distinguish between all-day events and time-specific events throughout December 13-15, 2009. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_timegrid_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: json CODE: ``` [{"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-13"}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-13"}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-13"}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-13"}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-13"}, {"title": "event", "start": {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 23:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 00 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Event Data for FullCalendar in JSON DESCRIPTION: JSON array of event objects configured for FullCalendar. Each event contains a title, start date/time, and an allDay property specifying whether it's an all-day event or a time-specific event. Events cover December 15-18, 2009. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_timegrid_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: JSON CODE: ``` {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 00:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 01:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 02:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 03:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 04:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 05:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 06:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 07:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 08:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 09:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 10:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 11:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 12:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 13:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 14:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 15:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 16:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 17:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 18:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 19:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 20:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 21:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 22:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-15 23:00:00", "allDay": false}... ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Event Data Array for FullCalendar in JSON DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines an array of event objects for use with FullCalendar. Each event has a title, start time, and optional allDay flag. The events are set for specific dates and times in December 2009. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/tests/manual/old/many_timegrid_events_json.txt#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: JSON CODE: ``` [{"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-18 01:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-18 02:00:00", "allDay": false}, {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-18 03:00:00", "allDay": false}, ... {"title": "event", "start": "2009-12-19 23:00:00", "allDay": false}] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuration Option Example in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Example showing TypeScript configuration options for columnHeaderFormat and related settings introduced in version 3.8.0 SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` { columnHeaderFormat: string, columnHeaderText: string, columnHeaderHtml: string } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Event Source Configuration DESCRIPTION: Example showing event source configuration for JSON feeds and Google Calendar integration SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { url: string, eventDataTransform: function, loading: function } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: View Configuration Options DESCRIPTION: Example showing view configuration options including visibleRange and validRange settings SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { visibleRange: { start: date, end: date }, validRange: { start: date, end: date }, dateIncrement: duration, dateAlignment: string } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins DESCRIPTION: Command to install FullCalendar core package, the Luxon 2 plugin, and the daygrid plugin. These are the necessary components for using FullCalendar with Luxon 2 integration. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon2/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/luxon2 @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins DESCRIPTION: This command installs the FullCalendar core package, the Moment plugin for enhanced date formatting, and the daygrid plugin for month view functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/moment/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/moment @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar core and plugin packages DESCRIPTION: Command to install the required FullCalendar packages including the core, RRule plugin, and DayGrid plugin for month view support. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/rrule/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/rrule @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Dependencies via NPM DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the core FullCalendar package, web-component package, and daygrid plugin using NPM SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/web-component/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install --save \ @fullcalendar/core \ @fullcalendar/web-component \ @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins DESCRIPTION: Command to install the FullCalendar core package, the Moment Timezone plugin, and the daygrid plugin for month view support. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/moment-timezone/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/moment-timezone @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Core and Plugins DESCRIPTION: Command to install the FullCalendar core package, the iCalendar plugin, and the daygrid plugin for month view functionality. These are the essential packages needed to create a calendar with iCalendar support. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/icalendar/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/icalendar @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Packages DESCRIPTION: Command to install the FullCalendar core package, Luxon plugin, and daygrid plugin for month view support. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon3/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/luxon3 @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Luxon and FullCalendar Packages DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing Luxon 1 and the necessary FullCalendar packages including the core, Luxon plugin, and additional plugins like daygrid. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon1/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install luxon@1 ``` LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @fullcalendar/core @fullcalendar/luxon @fullcalendar/daygrid ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Luxon 2 for FullCalendar DESCRIPTION: Command to install Luxon 2 as a dependency for the FullCalendar project. This is the first step in setting up the Luxon 2 plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon2/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install luxon@2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Moment.js and FullCalendar Dependencies DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to install Moment.js, which is a prerequisite for the FullCalendar Moment plugin. Moment.js provides enhanced date manipulation and formatting capabilities. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/moment/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install moment ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing RRule dependency for FullCalendar DESCRIPTION: Command to install the RRule library which is required for the FullCalendar RRule plugin to work. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/rrule/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install rrule ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing ical.js Dependency for FullCalendar DESCRIPTION: Command to install the ical.js library which is required for the FullCalendar iCalendar plugin to function correctly. This is the first dependency that must be installed. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/icalendar/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install ical.js ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Bootstrap 4 and Font Awesome Dependencies DESCRIPTION: This command installs the necessary Bootstrap 4 and Font Awesome packages using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/bootstrap4/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install bootstrap@4 @fortawesome/fontawesome-free ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar via NPM DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the command to install FullCalendar using NPM package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/bundle/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install fullcalendar ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing FullCalendar Repository with PNPM DESCRIPTION: This command installs the FullCalendar repository dependencies using PNPM package manager. This is used for development purposes when working on the FullCalendar library itself. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` pnpm install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Registering Global FullCalendar Element DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to register the FullCalendar web component globally with default tag name SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/web-component/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import '@fullcalendar/web-component/global' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing FullCalendar Element Tag Name DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code to define a custom tag name for the FullCalendar web component SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/web-component/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import { FullCalendarElement } from '@fullcalendar/web-component' customElements.define('some-calendar-tag', FullCalendarElement); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: FullCalendar CDN Implementation DESCRIPTION: HTML template showing CDN installation and basic calendar configuration with header toolbar options SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/web-component/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Moment Timezone Dependency DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Moment Timezone library, which is a prerequisite for the FullCalendar Moment Timezone plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/moment-timezone/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install moment-timezone ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting FullCalendar Options Programmatically DESCRIPTION: JavaScript code demonstrating how to set calendar options through DOM element properties SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/web-component/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` const fullCalendarElement = document.querySelector('full-calendar') fullCalendarElement.options = { headerToolbar: { left: 'prev,next today', center: 'title', right: 'dayGridMonth,dayGridWeek,dayGridDay' } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Luxon Dependency DESCRIPTION: Command to install Luxon version 3 as a prerequisite for the FullCalendar Luxon plugin. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/packages/luxon3/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install luxon@3 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: FullCalendar Configuration Options Example DESCRIPTION: Example configuration options showing common settings from version 1.3, including view options, header configuration, and theming parameters. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { date: new Date(), defaultView: 'month', aspectRatio: 1.35, disableResizing: false, monthNames: [], monthNamesShort: [], dayNames: [], dayNamesShort: [], theme: true, buttonText: {}, buttonIcons: {} } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Updating CSS for FullCalendar 1.1 DESCRIPTION: Changes made to fullcalendar.css in version 1.1 to support right-to-left layouts, variable start-of-week, IE6 resizing bug, and restructured THEAD and TBODY. Users upgrading from version 1.0 must update their CSS file. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` /* Modified fullcalendar.css - for right-to-left support - for variable start-of-week - for IE6 resizing bug - for THEAD and TBODY (in 1.0, just used TBODY, restructured in 1.1) IF UPGRADING FROM FULLCALENDAR 1.0, YOU MUST UPGRADE FULLCALENDAR.CSS */ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Directory Path Reference for Locale Contributions DESCRIPTION: Specifies the directory path where contributors should edit locale source files for the FullCalendar project. SOURCE: https://github.com/fullcalendar/fullcalendar/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` packages/core/locales/ ```
